# Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

We pledge to make participation in our project a harassment-free and respectful experience for everyone, regardless of individual differences.

## Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contribute to a positive environment:
- Respectful communication and collaboration
- Constructive feedback

Examples of unacceptable behavior:
- Harassment, insults, or derogatory comments
- Publishing private information without consent

## Reporting

Instances of abusive or unacceptable behavior can be reported confidentially to: [zepyxunderscore@gmail.com](mailto:zepyxunderscore@gmail.com)

All reports will be handled discreetly.

Adopted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/).
